description: Curated and deployed several projects with React JS and its associated libraries, including portfolio, news app, travel booking and more.
Hands-on industry level experience in the field of automation, 5G, telecommunication and data science
Worked on automation techniques, contributing to relevant projects in this stream to the organisation client side.
Managed and hosted on-site and remote events, including interviews, orientations, community initiatives, and workshops, impacting over 1000 students.
Curated content and strategized social media handles for the foundation, while gaining insights into global women’s welfare campaigns and initiatives.
